value.original: The selected accounting entries will be deleted! DANGEROUS !!!

row.value: Las entradas contables seleccionadas seran eliminadas! PRECAUCION !!!

value.original: Only used if Price List is used to set future/standard cost price

row.value: Se utiliza solamente si la Lista de Precios se usa para establecer el precio de costo futuro

value.original: Overwrite how to pay the invoice

row.value: Sobreescribe como se paga la factura

value.original: The Payment Rule indicates how the incoice will be settled - you can overwrite the value from the invoice.

row.value: La regla de pago indica el método como la factura será pagada - puede sobreescribir el valor de la factura.

value.original: The email is sent from the user selected - otherwise it is sent from the request email address of the client

row.value: El email es enviado desde un usuario especifico - de otra manera este es enviado desde una petición de dirección de email del cliente

value.original: Organizational entity within client - set to empty if you want to create a new organization

row.value: Organizational entity within client - set to empty if you want to create a new organization

value.original: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

row.value: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

value.original: If no Role is selected, grant access to all (non-manual) roles of the Client

row.value: If no Role is selected, grant access to all (non-manual) roles of the Client

value.original: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact

row.value: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact

value.original: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

value.original: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

row.value: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

value.original: If not defined on Business Partner Level

row.value: If not defined on Business Partner Level

value.original: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

row.value: El Rol determina la seguridad y acceso del usuario que posee este Rol

value.original: The Shipment Date indicates the date printed on the shipment.

row.value: The Shipment Date indicates the date printed on the shipment.

value.original: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only.

row.value: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only.

value.original: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only. This allows you to reprint only certain dunning entries.

row.value: Print the unprocessed (unprinted) entries of the dunning run only. This allows you to reprint only certain dunning entries.

value.original: Includes only the Tabs that Insert records
Generated Export Format for the Tabs with Insert Record is Yes

row.value: Generated Export Format for the Tabs with Insert Record is Yes

value.original: Generated an Export Format Line if the column is mandatory

row.value: Generated an Export Format Line if the column is mandatory

value.original: Valid from including this date (first day)

row.value: Válido desde incluyendo esta fecha (primer día)

value.original: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range

row.value: La fecha Válido Desde indica el primer día de un rango de fechas

value.original: Only documents within this date range which are also in open periods will be reset.

row.value: Solo los documentos dentro de este rango de fechas que estén en períodos abiertos serán reiniciados.

value.original: Define if this client will use business partner accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define si esta compañía usará tercero como dimensión contable. Esto puede cambiarse posteriormetne en la ventana de Esquema Contable de la compañía.

value.original: Define if this client will use product accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define si esta compañía usará producto como dimensión contable. Esto puede cambiarse posteriormetne en la ventana de Esquema Contable de la compañía.

value.original: Define if this client will use project accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define si esta compañía usará proyecto como dimensión contable. Esto puede cambiarse posteriormetne en la ventana de Esquema Contable de la compañía.

value.original: Define if this client will use campaign accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define si esta compañía usará campaña como dimensión contable. Esto puede cambiarse posteriormetne en la ventana de Esquema Contable de la compañía.
Usa dimensión contable región de ventas

value.original: Define if this client will use sales region accounting dimension. This can be changed later in Accounting Schema window of the client.

row.value: Define si esta compañía usará región de ventas como dimensión contable. Esto puede cambiarse posteriormetne en la ventana de Esquema Contable de la compañía.

value.original: Location of the chart of accounts to be used with this client. At this stage just the default accounts will be created.

row.value: Localización del archivo de plan de cuentas a ser usado por esta compañía. En este momento solamente las cuentas por defecto serán creadas.

value.original: Delete all existing summary data and recalculate.

row.value: Borra todos los datos actuales de resumen y recalcula.

value.original: If not selected, only those periods with recently posted accounting facts will be recalculated.

row.value: Si no se selecciona, solo aquellos períodos con hechos contables recientes serán recalculados.

value.original: Force rebuild of cube even if locked.

row.value: Forzar reconstrucción del cubo incluso si está bloqueado.
